name: ForRest Paper Doll
description:
For all my lovely ForRest creatures:

This is a dress up mini game made for all supports!

Chaging outfits and facial expressions, as well as backgrounds and many other items
You will have over 30 styles and 200+ parts to make up your own chibi ForRest doll here
Gallery also contains all fanarts created by incredible artists

Thanks for all and hope everyone can enjoy with my arts ₍˄·͈༝·͈˄*₎◞ ̑̑

—— Margaret ForRest



Thanks @Chuduuuu for making the Trailer,~~
